title: Fate/Grand Order: Fujimaru Ritsuka wa Wakaranai - Nenmatsu Special

synonyms: Fate/Grand Order: Fujimaru Ritsuka wa Wakaranai Episode 0
Fate/Grand Order: Fujimaru Ritsuka Doesn't Get It
alternative_titles.en: Fate/Grand Order: You've Lost Ritsuka Fujimaru - Year-End Special
alternative_titles.ja: Fate/Grand Order 藤丸立香はわからない 年末スペシャル

synopsis:
Ritsuka Fujimaru—humanity's last master. It would not have been possible to restore humanity without him. However, he does have a shortcoming... he is far too honest! A slapstick comedy in which Fujimaru's simple questions sway the heroic spirits!

(Source: MAL News)
